sentences.english: He was in the beginning with God. and was one with the Father.
sentences.chinese: 他太初就與神同在，與父原爲一。

sentences.english: I was set up from everlasting, from the beginning, or ever the earth was.
sentences.chinese: 從亙古，從太初，未有世界以前，我已被立。

sentences.english: The first achievement is the "Taichu Calendar" that he made.
sentences.chinese: 第一，就是他編制的歷法《太初曆》。

sentences.english: First let's have a basic understanding of this calendar.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏我們首先來認識一下《太初曆》。

sentences.english: Unleash your own spirit, and you will become the Primal Beast, uncaged and untamed.
sentences.chinese: 釋放自己的靈魂，你就會成爲桀驁不遜的太初之獸。

sentences.english: A glorious high throne from the beginning is the place of our sanctuary.
sentences.chinese: 我們的聖所是榮耀的寶座，從太初安置在高處。

sentences.english: Beginning the first year, God stone drop from the clouds, scattered in the world.
sentences.chinese: 太初元年，有神石從天而降，四散人間。

definition: time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)
